text.gatha: Chinda sotaṃ parakkamma, kāme panuda brāhmaṇa;
Yadā dvayesu dhammesu, pāragū hoti brāhmaṇo;
Athassa sabbe saṃyogā, atthaṃ gacchanti jānato.
Yassa pāraṃ apāraṃ vā, pārāpāraṃ na vijjati;
Sannaddho khattiyo tapati, jhāyī tapati brāhmaṇo;
Na brāhmaṇassa pahareyya, nāssa muñcetha brāhmaṇo;
Dhī [dhi (syā. byākaraṇesu)] brāhmaṇassa hantāraṃ, tato dhī yassa [yo + assa = yassa] muñcati.
Na brāhmaṇassetadakiñci seyyo, yadā nisedho manaso piyehi;
Yato yato hiṃsamano nivattati, tato tato sammatimeva dukkhaṃ.
Yassa kāyena vācāya, manasā natthi dukkaṭaṃ;
Saṃvutaṃ tīhi ṭhānehi, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
Na jaṭāhi na gottena, na jaccā hoti brāhmaṇo;
Yamhi saccañca dhammo ca, so sucī so ca brāhmaṇo.
Kiṃ te jaṭāhi dummedha, kiṃ te ajinasāṭiyā;
Ekaṃ vanasmiṃ jhāyantaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
Na cāhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brūmi, yonijaṃ mattisambhavaṃ;
Bhovādi nāma so hoti, sace hoti sakiñcano;
Sabbasaṃyojanaṃ chetvā, yo ve na paritassati;
Chetvā naddhiṃ [nandhiṃ (ka. sī.), nandiṃ (pī.)] varattañca, sandānaṃ [sandāmaṃ (sī.)] sahanukkamaṃ;
Yo na limpati [lippati (sī. pī.)] kāmesu, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
Nidhāya daṇḍaṃ bhūtesu, tasesu thāvaresu ca;
Yo na hanti na ghāteti, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
Yassa rāgo ca doso ca, māno makkho ca pātito;
Yāya nābhisaje kañci [kiñci (ka.)], tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
Yodha dīghaṃ va rassaṃ vā, aṇuṃ thūlaṃ subhāsubhaṃ;
Loke adinnaṃ nādiyati [nādeti (ma. ni. 2.459)], tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
Āsā yassa na vijjanti, asmiṃ loke paramhi ca;
Nirāsāsaṃ [nirāsayaṃ (sī. syā. pī.), nirāsakaṃ (?)] visaṃyuttaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
Asokaṃ virajaṃ suddhaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
Yomaṃ [yo imaṃ (sī. syā. kaṃ. pī.)] palipathaṃ duggaṃ, saṃsāraṃ mohamaccagā;
Tiṇṇo pāragato [pāragato (sī. syā. kaṃ. pī.)] jhāyī, anejo akathaṃkathī;
Yodha kāme pahantvāna [pahatvāna (sī. pī.)], anāgāro paribbaje;
Kāmabhavaparikkhīṇaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ [idaṃ gāthādvayaṃ videsapotthakesu sakideva dassitaṃ].
Hitvā mānusakaṃ yogaṃ, dibbaṃ yogaṃ upaccagā;
Cutiṃ yo vedi sattānaṃ, upapattiñca sabbaso;
Asattaṃ sugataṃ buddhaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
Yassa gatiṃ na jānanti, devā gandhabbamānusā;
Yassa pure ca pacchā ca, majjhe ca natthi kiñcanaṃ;
Anejaṃ nhātakaṃ [nahātakaṃ (sī. syā. kaṃ pī.)] buddhaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
text.paragraph: (Ettāvatā sabbapaṭhame yamakavagge cuddasa vatthūni, appamādavagge nava, cittavagge nava, pupphavagge dvādasa, bālavagge pannarasa, paṇḍitavagge ekādasa, arahantavagge dasa, sahassavagge cuddasa, pāpavagge dvādasa, daṇḍavagge ekādasa, jarāvagge nava, attavagge dasa, lokavagge ekādasa, buddhavagge nava [aṭṭha (ka.)], sukhavagge aṭṭha, piyavagge nava, kodhavagge aṭṭha, malavagge dvādasa, dhammaṭṭhavagge dasa, maggavagge dvādasa, pakiṇṇakavagge nava, nirayavagge nava, nāgavagge aṭṭha, taṇhāvagge dvādasa, bhikkhuvagge dvādasa, brāhmaṇavagge cattālīsāti pañcādhikāni tīṇi vatthusatāni.
text.gatha: Satattayañca vatthūnaṃ, pañcādhikaṃ samuṭṭhitāti) [( ) etthantare pāṭho videsapotthakesu natthi, aṭṭhakathāsuyeva dissati].

paragraph.note: [dhammapadassa vaggassuddānaṃ§yamakaṃ pamādaṃ cittaṃ, pupphaṃ bālañca paṇḍitaṃ.§rahantaṃ sahassaṃ pāpaṃ, daṇḍaṃ jarā attalokaṃ.§buddhaṃ sukhaṃ piyaṃ kodhaṃ, malaṃ dhammaṭṭhamaggañca.§pakiṇṇakaṃ nirayaṃ nāgaṃ, taṇhā bhikkhū ca brāhmaṇo.§gāthāyuddānaṃ§yamake vīsagāthāyo, appamādalokamhi ca.§piye dvādasagāthāyo, citte jarattekādasa.§pupphabālasahassamhi, buddha magga pakiṇṇake.§soḷasa paṇḍite kodhe, niraye nāge catuddasa.§arahante dasaggāthā, pāpasukhamhi terasa.§sattarasa daṇḍadhammaṭṭhe, malamhi ekavīsati.§taṇhāvagge sattabbīsa, tevīsa bhikkhuvaggamhi.§brāhmaṇe ekatālīsa, catussatā satevīsa. text.gatha: Arahanto sahassañca, pāpaṃ daṇḍena te dasa.
Jarā attā ca loko ca, buddho sukhaṃ piyena ca;
Pakiṇṇaṃ nirayo nāgo, taṇhā bhikkhu ca brāhmaṇo;
Bāle ca soḷasa gāthā, paṇḍitamhi catuddasa;
Arahante dasa gāthā, sahasse honti soḷasa.
Terasa pāpavaggamhi, daṇḍamhi dasa satta ca;
Ekādasa jarā vagge, attavaggamhi tā dasa.
Sukhe ca piyavagge ca, gāthāyo honti dvādasa.
Pakiṇṇe soḷasa gāthā, niraye nāge ca cuddasa;
